description: This file defines the main page component for a weather app frontend using React. It manages fetching weather data, locations, and user interactions such as adding/removing locations and handling errors.

methods.name: handleSearch
methods.description: Handles search input from Header component to set the selected location.

methods.name: handleAddLocation
methods.description: Adds a new location with optimistic UI update, then confirms or reverts based on API response.

methods.name: handleRemoveLocation
methods.description: Removes a location both in UI and server, reverting if API call fails.
